hero.title: Simplify your content planning with AI
hero.description: Kuzamo offers an AI-powered content planning and publishing workflow for small teams. Manage your blogs, social media, and emails from one place.
hero.ribbon: Move faster with AI â€” strategy, creation, publishing in one flow

en.features_description: Discover the core features of the AI-powered content planning and publishing platform.

features.heading: From content creation to publishing â€” one flow
features.description: Reduce chaos, automate repetitions, and bring your team together around one modern interface.
features.card1_desc: Generate titles, outlines, and multiple variations from your brief; instantly adjust tone and length.
features.card2_desc: Assign tasks, track statuses, manage deadlines, and control everything from a single screen.
features.card3_desc: Publish to WordPress, LinkedIn, X, and email with one click and see performance.

en.pricing_description: Explore our flexible plans during the early access period.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Flexible plans for AI-powered content planning and publishing.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
features: Custom AI models and data training

faq.a1: Yes, yearly billing includes two months free.
faq.a2: You can upgrade or downgrade anytime; prorated billing applies.
faq.q3: What's included in the Enterprise plan?
faq.a3: SSO, custom AI models, SLA, security reviews, and training are included.
faq.a4: During early access, the Free plan is available.

faq_page.subtitle: Can't find an answer? Contact us.

cta.title: Choose the right plan for your team
cta.desc: Questions? Reach out and we'll help you pick the best plan.

en.about_description: Learn about Kuzamo's story and mission.
en.faq_description: Frequently asked questions and answers about Kuzamo.

ai_content.question: How does AI content generation work?
ai_content.answer: Kuzamo provides AI-powered content suggestions based on your brief and target audience. You get tone, length, and style suggestions for blog posts, social media, and emails.

platforms.question: Which platforms do you support?
platforms.answer: We integrate with WordPress, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), Instagram, Facebook and email platforms. New platforms are continuously added.

collaboration.question: What collaboration features are available?
collaboration.answer: We provide approval workflows, task assignment, commenting and feedback system, real-time editing and version tracking.

analytics.question: Do you offer analytics and reporting?
analytics.answer: Yes, you can track content performance, see which content performs better, and improve AI suggestions with these insights.

languages.question: Is multi-language supported?
languages.answer: Yes, you can generate AI-powered content in Turkish and English with options suitable for your audience.

faq_page.subtitle: Can't find an answer? Contact us.

en.contact_description: Apply for early access to Kuzamo's AI-powered content planning and publishing platform. Start managing your blog, social media, and email content from one place.
en.form_message_placeholder: Write your questions or special requests here...
en.form_consent: I give explicit consent for Kuzamo to process my contact information to contact me. I have read and accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
en.form_email_duplicate: This email has already been submitted recently. Please check your inbox or try again later.
en.form_email_pending: A confirmation email has already been sent to this address. Please check your inbox.
en.form_email_confirmed: This email is already confirmed and you are on our list.
en.form_rate_limit: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
en.form_disposable_email: Disposable email addresses are not allowed. Please use a valid email address.
en.form_invalid_domain: Invalid email domain. Please use a valid email address.
en.form_unsubscribed: This email was previously unsubscribed. You can resubscribe by submitting the form again.
en.confirm_description: We're verifying your email address for early access. Please wait.
en.confirm_success_message: Welcome to Kuzamo! Your email has been verified and you've been added to our early access list. We'll notify you when the product is ready and you can start using it.
en.confirm_error_message: We couldn't confirm your email address. This could be due to an expired or invalid confirmation link.
en.unsubscribe_success_message: You have been successfully unsubscribed from our emails. You will no longer receive notifications from us.
en.unsubscribe_error_message: There was an error processing your unsubscribe request. The link may be invalid or expired.
en.unsubscribe_loading_message: Please wait while we process your request.
en.form_footer: Form data is processed only to respond to your request; email sending is provided through your preferred infrastructure; this site does not provide direct service to any provider.

how.heading: How it works
how.step1_desc: Define channels and goals; build your content calendar.
how.step2_desc: Use the AI studio to generate, revise, and submit for approval.
how.step3_desc: Schedule, publish with one click, and track performance on the dashboard.

integrations.heading: Integrates with the tools you love
integrations.description: Works with WordPress, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), and email services.

bullets.social: Multi-account publishing for LinkedIn and X

testimonials.section_subtext: Kuzamo reduces chaos and speeds up the process so small teams can focus.
testimonials.q1: â€œWith Kuzamo, our social and blog flow converged in one screen. We save 6+ hours weekly.â€
testimonials.q2: â€œCalendar and approvals are very simple. AI suggestions significantly reduce editorsâ€™ workload.â€
testimonials.q3: â€œWith email and blog integrations, the publishing flow finishes with one click.â€

points.one: Plan, create, and publish on a single screen

finalcta.heading: Accelerate your content team
finalcta.description: Join during early access and be among the first to give feedback.

en.footer_description: AI-powered content planning and publishing workflow for small teams. Manage your blogs, social media, and emails from one place.

footer.description: AI-powered content planning and publishing workflow for small teams. Manage your blogs, social media, and emails from one place.

about_page.title: What is Kuzamo?
about_page.description1: Kuzamo is a comprehensive workflow platform that helps small and agile teams plan, create, and publish blog, social, and email content with AI.
about_page.description2: With modern API integrations, access WordPress, LinkedIn, X, Instagram, and email platforms from one place. Strengthen your content strategy with AI suggestions, team collaboration tools, and analytics.
about_page.cta_desc: Join early access and help shape the product.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy provides information about the personal data collected, used, and protected on the Kuzamo website. The security of your data is important to us.
privacy.data_collection_intro: At Kuzamo, we collect the following data to improve our services and provide you with a better experience:
privacy.processing_purposes_intro: We process the collected data for the following purposes:
purposes_list: To respond to your requests and provide support
To provide secure, fast, and error-free service
privacy.legal_basis_intro: Our data processing activities are based on the following legal grounds within the scope of KVKK and GDPR:
privacy.retention_warning: Important: Your personal data is retained for as long as necessary for the purpose and does not exceed legal periods.
privacy.third_parties_intro: Your data may be shared with third parties in the following situations:
privacy.your_rights_intro: Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.security_intro: Security: We take the following measures to protect your data:

cookie_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_policy.intro: This cookie policy provides information about cookies and similar technologies used on the Kuzamo website. Cookies are used to provide you with a better experience on our website.
cookie_policy.what_are_cookies_text: Cookies are small text files sent to your browser by the website. These files are stored on your computer and help the website recognize you, remember your preferences, and improve the overall user experience.
cookie_policy.necessary_cookies_desc: These cookies are essential for the basic functions of the website and are used for security, session management, and basic site functionality.
cookie_policy.necessary_cookies_note: Note: These cookies cannot be disabled as they are required for the website to function.
cookie_policy.analytics_cookies_desc: These cookies help us analyze site usage, measure performance, and improve user experience.
cookie_policy.analytics_cookies_note: Note: These cookies are optional and are not used without your consent.
cookie_policy.marketing_cookies_desc: These cookies help us provide you with personalized ads and content.
cookie_policy.marketing_cookies_note: Note: These cookies are optional and are not used without your consent.
cookie_policy.preference_cookies_desc: These cookies remember your language preferences, theme choices, and other personalization settings.
cookie_policy.preference_cookies_note: Note: These cookies are optional and are not used without your consent.
cookie_policy.management_intro: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time:
cookie_policy.consent_banner_desc: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie consent banner that allows you to accept all cookies or customize your preferences.
cookie_policy.cookie_settings_desc: You can access detailed cookie settings through the floating widget (bottom-right corner) or by clicking "Cookie Settings" in the banner.
cookie_policy.update_preferences_desc: You can update your cookie preferences at any time by revisiting the cookie settings modal.
cookie_policy.third_party_intro: Some cookies on our website are set by third-party services:
duration_list: Session Cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
Persistent Cookies: Remain until expiration date or manual deletion
Necessary Cookies: Automatically renewed for site functionality
cookie_policy.browser_settings_intro: You can also control cookies through your browser settings:
updates_list: This policy may be updated periodically
Changes will be posted on this page
Significant changes will be notified via email
Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes
cookie_policy.contact_intro: For questions about our cookie policy:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms of service define the rules and conditions you must follow when using the Kuzamo platform. By using the platform, you are deemed to have accepted these terms.
terms.service_scope_text: Kuzamo is a web application that facilitates AI-powered content planning, draft generation, and multi-platform publishing workflows. It allows you to manage your blog, social media, and email content from a single location.
terms.account_responsibility_intro: During platform usage, you have the following responsibilities:
account_security_list: Account security and password protection are user responsibilities
Strong password usage and regular updates are recommended
Suspicious activities must be reported immediately
platform_integrations_list: WordPress, LinkedIn, X, Instagram, etc. platform rules
Compliance with each platform's own terms of use
ai_content_responsibility_list: AI recommendations are for guidance only
Final content responsibility lies with the user
Content quality and appropriateness must be verified
terms.acceptable_use_intro: You must follow the following rules when using the platform:
terms.email_usage_warning: Important: The following rules must be followed for bulk email sending:
email_usage_list: Explicit consent must be obtained from recipients
KVKK and GDPR compliance must be ensured
terms.pricing_text: Current plans and prices are detailed on the
terms.liability_intro: Kuzamo is not responsible in the following cases:
terms.liability_note_text: Service is provided "as is" and no warranty is given.
changes_list: Terms may be updated with announcements
Important changes are notified via email
Current version is published on this page
Changes are announced 30 days in advance
terms.contact_intro: For questions about terms of service:
